```{r setup, include=FALSE, cache = TRUE, warning = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

## Download data
```{r download}
ind <- read.csv("chs_individual.csv")
reg <- read.csv("chs_regional.csv")
```

## Merge datasets
```{r merge}
data <- merge(
  x = ind,
  y = reg,
  by ="townname"
)
```
